message.name: ERR_PRODUCTAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This Product Appeal Process has already been canceled.
This Product Appeal Process has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A Product Appeal Process already exists with the same start date.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTAPPEALPROCESS_FV_STARTDATE_MISSING
message.locale: The Product Appeal Process must have a start date.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTAPPEALPROCESS_FV_STARTDATE_PAST
message.locale: The start date must be after today.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_PAST_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Product Appeal Process has already started and cannot be canceled.
The Product Appeal Process has already started and cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTAPPEALPROCESS_XRV_NO_ACTIVE_PROCESS
message.locale: There is no appeal process defined for this product.
